content: And we clearly still have some tools in our tool belt to manage to get to where we want to drive expectations for the full year knowing that we're going to be in another general rate case, unfortunately, but that's part of the process we need to go through. And as we mentioned, that's really the question that we want to answer as part of this process is not only snap the line on capitalization, but then also determine through an AAO or whatever the right approach is, how we're going to defer the other prudent cost for consideration in the next rate case.
